help_message_1: To setup a slot notifiction just type '
help_message_2: slot' and respond to the bot with the according information.
channel_message:
What is the id of the channel the notification should appear in?
(e.g. 123456789123456789)
channel_failed: Not a valid channel id. Please retry.
role_message:
Who should be notified? (e.g. @slots / @everyone)
Type 'None' if you don't want to notify anybody.
role_failed: Not a valid mention! Only mention a role or @everyone/@here. Please retry.
header_message: What are the slots for? (e.g. Supreme Week 1 Slots)
form_message:
What form should the participants fill out? (e.g. https://goo.gl/forms/11111111111)
Type 'DM' if you want the participants to send you a direct message instead.
fee_message: What is the fee for the slots? (e.g. $10 PAS / Free)
retail_message:
What is the retail price for the item? (e.g. $100)
Type 'None' for multiple items.
date_message:
When is the release date of the item/s? (e.g. 01.01.2019)
Type 'None' if you don't want to add a release date.
resell_message:
What is the resell estimate? (e.g. $50-$100 Profit)
Type 'None' for no resell estimate.
droplist_message:
Do you have a droplist in case of multiple Items?
(e.g. https://www.supremecommunity.com/season/spring-summer2019/droplist/2019-02-25/)
Type 'None' if you don't have one.
image_message:
Do you have a image you want to attach?
(e.g. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/D0VzM1JUcAIpccN.jpg)
Type 'None' if you don't have one.
sure_message: This is the slot message. Would you like to change anything? (yes/no)
failed_sure: Not a valid response! Please answer with either 'yes' or 'no'.
change_message:
What would you like to change?
Type the number next to a paramneter to change its value.
When you are finished type 'finished'
change_message_2:
__ __
1.  Channel
2.  Notified Role
3.  Titel
4. Form link
5. Fee
6. Retail price
7. Release date
8. Resell prediction
9. Droplist
10. Image
__ __
**Type 'message' if u want to see the current message.**
link_failed: Not a valid link! Please try again.
stop_info: If you want to cancle creating a notification type 'stop'.
stop_message:
Slot notification was canceled,
to create a new one just type
failed_delete: Not a valid response! Please try again.
